articles.description: Indian and Pakistani social media influencers, Anjali Chakra and Sufi Malik, have announced the termination of their relationship and the cancellation of their upcoming marriage via Instagram. They attributed Sufi's infidelity as the cause of their separation…

articles.author: Janani K
articles.title: Viral: Rajinikanth celebrates Holi with daughters and grandchildren - India Today
articles.description: Superstar Rajinikanth celebrated Holi 2024 with his daughters Aishwarya and Soundarya and his grandchildren It was also the day when veteran director K Balachander rechristened Shivaji Rao Gaikwad as Rajinikanth
articles.content: Superstar Rajinikanth celebrated Holi 2024 with his wife, Latha, daughters, Aishwarya and Soundarya, and his grandchildren. Their Holi party took place at their Poes Garden home in Chennai. Holi is e… [+1792 chars]

articles.author: Ayushi Srivastava
articles.title: Tamannaah Bhatia raises the fashion bar in a stylish teal green cut-out dress - TOI Etimes
articles.description: Tamannaah Bhatia turns up the heat with her latest photoshoot.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, the actress opted for nude eyeshadow, mascaraed lashes, darkened brows, blushed cheeks, luminous highlighter and a shade of light pink lipstick.
